(:action purchase
  ; Purchase or acquire an item and update its status
  :parameters (?p - player ?item - item ?location - location)
  :precondition (and
    (at ?p ?location)
    (or (and (at ?item ?location) (for_sale ?item ?location))
        (stored ?location ?item))
  )
  :effect (and
    (inventory ?p ?item)
    (not (at ?item ?location))

(:action store ; Store an item in a location
    :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object ?location - location)
    :precondition (and (inventory ?agent ?item) (at ?agent ?location))
    :effect (and (stored ?location ?item) (not (inventory ?agent ?item))

(:action use ; Utilize a resource to achieve a desired state change
:parameters (?user - person ?resource - object ?target - object ?location - place)
:precondition (and (at ?user ?location) (stored ?location ?resource) (needs_transformation ?target))
:effect (and (transformed ?target) (not (needs_transformation ?target))
